title: PM prays for early recovery of Javed Hashmi
content:
In a statement, the Prime Minister expressed best wishes for Makhdoom Javed Hashmi on his operation.He said Javed Hashmi was a sincere brother and a precious asset of the country and the party.He prayed to Allah for health of Javed Hashmi.
